alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 12 at 4:07AM CDT until September 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 5 to 9 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Sheboygan, and Ozaukee counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Vollrath Park in Sheboygan... Deland Park Beach in Sheboygan... North Beach in Port Washington...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
